radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffuse cortical dysplasia with calcification of the right cerebral hemisphere consistent with hemimegalencephaly. Subarachnoid cysts within the cerebellomedullary and cerebellopontine cisterns. Bilateral lipomas at the cerebellopontine angles. Extensive melanosis of the leptomeninges, left amygdala, and cerebellar hemispheres. A frondlike choroid plexus papilloma identified in the trigone of the right lateral ventricle.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up MRI scans at 2, 4, 6, and 17 months of age were unchanged.
